name: Blocky Hero Survival Neighbor
description:
Enjoy the survival stealth escape mode of Blocky Hero Survival Neighbor game and show your neighbors some of your crazy tricks in this usa crime city. Since you broke out the prison and came to this town, your strange angry neighbors of this usa crime city are acting weird. They are treating you badly and calling you a criminal who escaped from prison. You never liked living in this blocky town and now it's become impossible to bear them. It's time to show your strange evil side to your angry neighbors. Start your mission by stealing various useful things from your blocky crazy neighborhoods and try not to get caught. Take revenge of their bad behavior in this open world crazy vegas town. Enjoy free roaming with stealth mode and survive the risk of being caught and escape while avoiding your strange neighbors of crazy vegas town.
You will get plenty of interesting and useful things in backyard of their mansions. Tease your neighbors by stealing tool boxes, tables, chairs, wooden boxes, mattress, important documents, and vollyballs from their blocky houses. They have k9 dogs and security alarms which is going to make it even more exciting. Beware of police, they are one patrol and if you get caught by them. You could get punished and go to jail for stealing and escaping from your strange neighbors scary blocky houses. Only this time you may not be able to break prison.
